name: Skarb Templariuszy
overview: Skarb Templariuszy is an adventure game with graphics presented in the form of photographs. The action takes place in an old Castle and in the surrounding countryside. The main goal of the player is finding a mystical ring opening the treasure of the Templar Order Knights. The character may carry up to ten items that can be used and combined. The game screen is divided into inventory/action panel, commentary field and photograph showing the current location.
